Once I clicked download my phone entered a restart and started putting messages on my screen like â€œprivate data uploading to the Chinese Government, donâ€™t power offâ€. I tried to power off my phone to end the upload, but it wouldnâ€™t! After a hour of the upload, my phone shut off and didnâ€™t turn back on. In the end I had to buy a brand new phone. Honestly the worst experience of my life! I canâ€™t believe our president is scamming us for our data! Apple needs to remove this app now or I will be suing for damages!!!

attributes.title: Please donâ€™t download this
attributes.review: I am beyond petrified and displeased with this app. I can not believe I have the strength to even write this review. One day I was flying my pet baguette to Hollywood Arts to get neutered when I can across this app. I say to myself, â€œThis app looks like the best thing since cheese ball man!â€ So you know I had to download. Man was I wrong. Upon first opening the app it had two options of movie choices including the Emoji Movie and the live action The Last Airbender, and until you picked a movie the song Friday by Rebecca Black would not stop playing at full volume. I now have to take speech classes to help with what thus app did to me. I hope no one has to experience what I did ever.

attributes.title: Awful experience.
attributes.review:
Upon opening the app everything seems fine. Then you are asked to enter your phone number to set up an account, this is where it all goes wrong. 

Firstly, they get your information via your cell number (which is not legal) but then they use that information to put you in categories called â€œIdentifiersâ€ or IDs for short. Some of the identifiers made sense, such as previous Trump voter, registered to vote, Dem-To-Rep. But then they get more offensive and specific. I was given an ID that just said the n-word. Not only that but some of my friends were given IDs that just called them the f-slur. Iâ€™d like to see this patched but until then thus app is horrible.

I looked at my phone and noticed the app had disappeared magically. I opened the AppStore and couldnâ€™t find the app. Until 5 days later I looked again and saw the app on the AppStore.
